message: I need to set up dashboard delivery for my project lead.
For the project lead, I recommend daily email reports at 8:30 AM with a summary of key project updates, including task completion rates and critical issues.
Could you add a performance overview and any pending approvals to the key metrics?
Sure! Iâ€™ve added a performance overview and pending approvals to the report. The delivery schedule remains the same. Would you like to set up a secondary report for the financial team?
Yes, I need a weekly report for the financial lead.
I suggest sending it every Friday at 4 PM via Slack, with a focus on budget updates, cost overruns, and pending approvals. Does this schedule work for you?
